name: fox
description: There is a fox here. It is a ball of fire but small
memory: You had a fox once. Those were better times.

name: rock
description: There is a rock here, its name is Petroc Trelawney
memory: ...was a pet rock given to Jenna by Silas and the rest of the Heap family on her 10th birthday, also the day she discovered she was a princess. He is a small ovular gray rock, nice and smooth. He was awakened by Silas using a charm he got from the Traveling Rock Shop.
